description: This table contains historical information about the change in benefit statuses.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the benefits record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EDIT_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant that the record status was changed.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user who changed the record status.

columns.name: EDIT_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the action that was applied to the record status.


May contain organization-specific values: No
